page.title: 11TRADE:THE ELM TREE INN.
page.content: THE{ELM TREE INN,}SOME 400 YEARS OLD, IS OWNED BY THE{DEVENISH BREWERY}AND IS OWNED BY THE TENANTS{MR. & MRS. D. {ROSS. THE{INN}IS AN ATTRACTIVE BUILDING, DIVIDED INTO 2{BARS,}WITH COSY FURNISHING.IT HAS A{MENU}WITH A VARIETY OF CHOICE OF LUNCHES AND EVENING MEALS.IN THE SUMMER YOU CAN EAT OUTSIDE. ON{GUY FAWKES NIGHT}THEY HAVE A GREAT PARTY. THEY SELL{HOT-DOGS, CHIPS {AND HAMBURGERS,}TOGETHER WITH{TEA , {COFFEE, ORANGE, LEMON AND BEER}.THE {BONFIRE}IS LIT AND THE{GUY}SLOWLY BURNS AWAY.LAST YEAR (IN{1984)}THE {BONFIRE}KEPT ALIGHT UNTIL{8:00am}THE NEXT DAY. THIS YEAR{(1985) THE ELM TREE INN WON THE{DEVENISH QUIZ}IN A{KNOCKOUT {COMPETITION.
